Pearc_neocortex

July 21, 2021

Keith Phuthi and Matthew Guttenberg have been using Neocortex, a groundbreaking AI supercomputer, to model atomistic potential energy surfaces. Learn more in HPCWire: Wafer-Scale-Engine Technology Accelerates Machine Learning, HPC.

Our Group is primarily based in the Shanghai University Computer Engineering Science Department, with additional affiliations with Artificial Intelligence Institute.
